update quantity_info set quantiy_rank = #{quantiyRank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity_percentage = #{quantityPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, quantity_draw = #{quantityDraw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, quantity_dec = #{quantityDec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = now() where quantity_id = #{quantityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from quantity_info where #{quantityPercentage,jdbcType=DECIMAL} > quantity_percentage ORDER BY quantiy_rank DESC
